column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I have been here many times
column2: simply because of the excellent location. The food is decent
column3: but the wait is always long. For a place named wildberry
column4: the wildberry options are a bit disappointing
column5: but there are a few gems hidden amongst the riff raff in their menu. I particularly love the banana bread french toast
column6: and I'm not usually a french toast fan. The coffee bar isn't great
column7: but the place is nice and the staff (beyond the front desk) is friendly. Being as the place is always crowded
column8: they should give people more time to respond when their buzzer goes off to collect themselves and get there. I was with family and the kids were a little ways down the street and they made us wait for the next table because they weren't there immediately with us. Very unreasonable
column9: particularly as they encourage people to wait outside as their "lobby" / waiting area is tiny.
